long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension, built with Manifest V3, is an unofficial tool designed to enhance the Are.na user experience. It introduces new features, such as the ability to snip and capture specific sections of a webpage, take full-page screenshots with a single click, and easily drag and drop content directly into Are.na blocks.
